properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ray ô ! an-tananao ny fiainako
Hazony mafy isan'andro
Ho eo anilanao tokoa
No fiononan'ny foko izao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Anilanao ry Raiko tia
Eo anilanao mandrakizay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He fiadanana tanteraka
No eo anilanao ry Tompo
Fo ampoky ny zava-tsoa
No tsapako raha eo aminao.
Anilanao, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Anilanao anio, ampitso koa
Anilanao tontolo andro
Anilanao tanteraka
Anilanao eo no tiako tokoa
Anilanao, sns.
